description.S1: Lilya will want to know what happened at Dr. Chartrand's estate.
description.S2: She can be found at SubLight Headquarters on the Groundbreaker.

blurb.B1: Afterwards, report back to Hagen on the Groundbreaker for either the reward and some ship decorations in the Captain's quarters,
blurb.B2: or the dismissal from Sublight (along with a Reputation decrease),
blurb.B3: depending on whether or not Dr. Chartrand was killed.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I spoke to Chartrand. I'm not going to kill her.

dialog.speaker: LilyaHagen (Female)
dialog.utterance: Well damn. The contractor grew a conscience. As your employer I'm both angry and disappointed. I'll add that to your file.

dialog.speaker: LilyaHagen (Female)
dialog.utterance: Technically I owe you an exit interview. Care to justify your betrayal of our species, or are we finished here?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You misunderstood Chartrand's research. She's our best shot at survival in Halcyon.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You're crazy, Lilya. I'm not killing someone to feed your paranoia.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Do I at least get a letter of referral?

dialog.speaker: LilyaHagen (Female)
dialog.utterance: You're awfully quick to trust someone who offed her colleagues and called it a good start.

dialog.speaker: LilyaHagen (Female)
dialog.utterance: Out of my office. We're done.

dialog.speaker: LilyaHagen (Female)
dialog.utterance: Seeing as you're the first one to complain about my paranoia, have you ever considered that *you* might be the problem?

dialog.speaker: LilyaHagen (Female)
dialog.utterance: Oh *sure.* I'll get right on it. Everyone hear that? Yeah. This guy's getting a letter of referral.
